text.title: Joe Hockey agrees to lobby states to ditch tampon tax
text.head: Joe Hockey agrees to lobby states to ditch tampon tax
Sources

list.item: Emma Griffiths. "Tampon tax: Tony Abbott says removing GST on sanitary items 'certainly not something Government plans to do'" — ABC News (Australia) , May 27, 12:50am
Alex Lee. "Joe Hockey Says He Supports Removing The Tax On Tampons" — BuzzFeed News , May 26, 6:00am
Anna Henderson. "Tampon tax: Joe Hockey agrees to lobby states to ditch GST on sanitary items after question from student on Q&A" — ABC News (Australia) , May 26, 10:30am
Subeta Vimalarajah. "STOP TAXING MY PERIOD!" — CommunityRun and GetUp Australia , May, 2015
